Since 1982, Aspen Systems has been a leader in the custom design, manufacture and service of a
wide array of high-performance computing systems.
We've built our reputation as a leading provider of Beowulf-class clusters by offering custom software configurations, cluster management software ,
a choice of processors, and connectivity for your specific performance needs. [ ADVERTISE HERE ]

Aspen Systems has several systems with different configurations
        available for testing and running your benchmarks.

Single Core Opteron 252 2.6 GHz, 4 GB DDR400 RAM, 36 GB U320 SCSI Hard Drive, Fedora Core 4 Dual Core Opteron 275 2.2 GHz, 4 GB DDR400 RAM, 36 GB U320 SCSI Hard Drive, Fedora Core 4 Intel Xeon EM64T (Nocona) 3.4 GHz, 1 MB L2 cache, 2 GB DDR400 RAM, 36 GB U320 SCSI Hard Drive, SuSE 9.3 More . . .
Follow the link below to request benchmark testing on one of our systems.

The Aspen Beowulf Cluster management system (ABC) software package provides an administrator with the ability to manage, monitor & maintain
        all aspects of a Linux-based Beowulf cluster via an SSL encrypted web browser interface. Follow the link below to learn more about Aspen Beowulf Cluster management software.
